name: learning-management-system
description: A comprehensive Learning Management System with student and admin features

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.dev: npm run build && nodemon --watch src --exec "npm run build && node dist/backend/server.js"
scripts.dev:backend: nodemon --watch src/backend --exec "npm run build:backend && node dist/backend/server.js"
